Class DefaultXSiteMetricsCollector

java.lang.Object
org.infinispan.xsite.metrics.DefaultXSiteMetricsCollector
All Implemented Interfaces:
XSiteMetricsCollector
public class DefaultXSiteMetricsCollector extends Object implements XSiteMetricsCollector
Implementation of XSiteMetricsCollector to use when asynchronous backups (cross-site replication) are configured.
Since:
13.0
Author:
Pedro Ruivo
